A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-loving elderly neighbor, a friendly young cat, and the love that ensues between the two.
Based on the Broadway musical of the same name and love between humans and felines is a story of love and hate with a heroine, but also a beautiful tale of pure and true love between cat and a man.
El
